Name: Axebreaker 1
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against an axe user, unit makes a follow-up attack and the foe cannot.

Name: Axebreaker 2
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against an axe user, unit makes a follow-up attack and the foe cannot.

Name: Axebreaker 3
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against an axe user, unit makes a follow-up attack and the foe cannot.

Name: B Tomebreaker 1
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a blue tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: B Tomebreaker 2
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a blue tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: B Tomebreaker 3
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a blue tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Bowbreaker 1
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Bowbreaker 2
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Bowbreaker 3
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Brash Assault 1
Desc: Unit automatically makes a follow-up when at HP < 30% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Name: Brash Assault 2
Desc: Unit automatically makes a follow-up when at HP < 40% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Name: Brash Assault 3
Desc: Unit automatically makes a follow-up when at HP < 50% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Name: Daggerbreaker 1
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Daggerbreaker 2
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Daggerbreaker 3
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Desperation 1
Desc: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 25%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Name: Desperation 2
Desc: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 50%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Name: Desperation 3
Desc: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 75%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Name: Drag Back
Desc: If unit initiates attack, the unit moves 1 space away after combat. Foe moves into unit's previous space.

Name: Escape Route 1
Desc: Enables unit whose own HP ≤ 30% to wrap adjacent to any ally.

Name: Escape Route 2
Desc: Enables unit whose own HP ≤ 40% to wrap adjacent to any ally.

Name: Escape Route 3
Desc: Enables unit whose own HP ≤ 50% to wrap adjacent to any ally.

Name: G Tomebreaker 1
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: G Tomebreaker 2
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: G Tomebreaker 3
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Guard 1
Desc: If unit's HP is 100% at start of combat, enemy is inflicted with Special cooldown charge-1.

Name: Guard 2
Desc: If unit's HP is 90% at start of combat, enemy is inflicted with Special cooldown charge-1.

Name: Guard 3
Desc: If unit's HP is 80% at start of combat, enemy is inflicted with Special cooldown charge-1.

Name: Hit and Run
Desc: If unit initiates attack, unit\nadvances 1 space after battle.

Name: Knock Back
Desc: If unit initiates attack, foe is moved 1 space away after combat

Name: Lancebreaker 1
Desc: If unit's HP > 90% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Lancebreaker 2
Desc: If unit's HP > 70% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Lancebreaker 3
Desc: If unit's HP > 50% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Lunge
Desc: If unit initiates attack, after combat, unit and targeted foe swap places.

Name: Obstruct 1
Desc: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 90%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Name: Obstruct 2
Desc: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 70%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Name: Obstruct 3
Desc: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 50%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Name: Pass 1
Desc: Unit can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 75%.

Name: Pass 2
Desc: Unit can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 50%.

Name: Pass 3
Desc: Unit can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 25%.

Name: Poison Strike 1
Desc: Inflicts 4 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Name: Poison Strike 2
Desc: Inflicts 7 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Name: Poison Strike 3
Desc: Inflicts 10 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Name: Quick Riposte 1
Desc: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack if attacked at HP ≥ 90%.

Name: Quick Riposte 2
Desc: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack if attacked at HP ≥ 80%.

Name: Quick Riposte 3
Desc: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack if attacked at HP ≥ 70%.

Name: R Tomebreaker 1
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: R Tomebreaker 2
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: R Tomebreaker 3
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Renewal 1
Desc: At the start of every fourth turn, restores 10 HP.

Name: Renewal 2
Desc: At the start of every third turn, restores 10 HP.

Name: Renewal 3
Desc: At the start of every second turn, restores 10 HP.

Name: Seal Atk 1
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Atk-3 through its next action.

Name: Seal Atk 2
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Atk-5 through its next action.

Name: Seal Atk 3
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Atk-7 through its next action.

Name: Seal Def 1
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Def -3 through its next action.

Name: Seal Def 2
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Def -5 through its next action.

Name: Seal Def 3
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Def -7 through its next action.

Name: Seal Res 1
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Res-3 through its next action.

Name: Seal Res 2
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Res-5 through its next action.

Name: Seal Res 3
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Res-7 through its next action.

Name: Seal Spd 1
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Spd-3 through its next action.

Name: Seal Spd 2
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Spd-5 through its next action.

Name: Seal Spd 3
Desc: After combat, foe suffers Spd-7 through its next action.

Name: Swordbreaker 1
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Swordbreaker 2
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Swordbreaker 3
Desc: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Name: Vantage 1
Desc: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 25%

Name: Vantage 2
Desc: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 50%

Name: Vantage 3
Desc: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 75%

Name: Wary Fighter 1
Desc: Prevents follow up attack in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 90%

Name: Wary Fighter 2
Desc: Prevents follow up attack in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 70%

Name: Wary Fighter 3
Desc: Prevents follow up attack in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 50%

Name: Watersweep 1
Desc: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with magic, staff or dragonstone, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 5, foe can’t counterattack.

Name: Watersweep 2
Desc: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with magic, staff or dragonstone, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 3, foe can’t counterattack.

Name: Watersweep 3
Desc: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with magic, staff or dragonstone, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 1, foe can’t counterattack.

Name: Windsweep 1
Desc: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with sword, lance, axe, bow, or dagger, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 5, foe can’t counterattack.

Name: Windsweep 2
Desc: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with sword, lance, axe, bow, or dagger, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 3, foe can’t counterattack.

Name: Windsweep 3
Desc: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with sword, lance, axe, bow, or dagger, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 1, foe can’t counterattack.

Name: Wings of Mercy 1
Desc: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 30%.

Name: Wings of Mercy 2
Desc: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 40%.

Name: Wings of Mercy 3
Desc: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 50%.
